mapper.select: SELECT m.*, r.id as rid, r.`name` as rname, r.nameZh as rnameZh FROM role r LEFT JOIN menu_role mr ON mr.rid = r.id LEFT JOIN menu m ON mr.mid = m.id WHERE m.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY m.id

SELECT DISTINCT m2.*, m1.`id` AS id2, m1.`component` AS component2, m1.`enabled` AS enabled2, m1.`iconCls` AS iconCls2, m1.`keepAlive` AS keepAlive2, m1.`name` AS name2, m1.`parentId` AS parentId2, m1.`requireAuth` AS requireAuth2, m1.`path` AS path2 FROM hr_role hrr LEFT JOIN menu_role mr ON mr.rid = hrr.rid LEFT JOIN menu m1 ON m1.id = mr.mid LEFT JOIN menu m2 ON m1.parentId = m2.id WHERE hrr.hrid = #{hrid} AND m2.`enabled` = TRUE ORDER BY m1.`id`, m2.`id`
